price: 16. Et (évoque) Abraham lorsqu’il dit à son peuple : « Adorez Allah, craignez-Le, cela vaut mieux pour vous, si vous saviez !
arabic: وَإِبۡرَٰهِيمَ إِذۡ قَالَ لِقَوۡمِهِ ٱعۡبُدُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَٱتَّقُوهُۖ ذَٰلِكُمۡ خَيۡرٞ لَّكُمۡ إِن كُنتُمۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wa-ib'rāhīma idh qāla liqawmihi uʿ'budū al-laha wa-ittaqūhu dhālikum khayrun lakum in kuntum taʿlamūna
